sources.title: Dreams
sources.description:
A mysterious connection is established between pre-revolutionary Russia and post-Soviet Russia. A young countess and a dishwasher from a canteen see the same nightmare: they dream of an incredible, absurd country in which the viewer, of course, recognizes his homeland. It seems that it is impossible to get rid of this nonsense. But the heroes of the film find an unexpected simple solution...

Year of production: 1993

Director: Shakhnazarov Karen, Borodyansky Alexander
Screenwriter: Karen Shakhnazarov, Alexander Borodyansky
Composer: Kroll Anatoly
Operator: Brozhovsky Boris
Production Designer: Leonid Svintsitsky

Cast: Oleg Basilashvili, Amalia Mordvinova, Armen Dzhigarkhanyan, Ides Arnold, Alexei Zharkov
Rostotsky Andrey, Vertogradov Andrey Arkadyevich,
Nosik Valery, Merkuriev Petr
